course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Introduction to Chinese Art
course.description: This course is a chronological and thematic survey of Chinese visual art from the Neolithic period to modern times. Topics introduced include ancient Chinese bronze and jade, pottery and ceramics, Buddhist art and sculpture, painting and calligraphy, garden and architecture.

reviews.author: 55tin
reviews.comment_content: 廣泛。包括瓷器、佛像、俑、建築、書法等等，要是喜歡看藝術品可以一試。
reviews.comment_teaching:
平時上課ppt都是圖片，字比較少，氣氛輕鬆。記一下老師的分析和觀察，還有其他人的發言，考試不怕寫不出來。
老師視乎比較喜歡簡潔的ppt，我組的ppt就被說字太多，然後就在匯報之前就改了。
老師人很好。
reviews.comment_grading:
考試是判斷藝術品的年代、工藝、特色、出自誰人等等，但對錯不是最重要的，老師比較看重你的推論和判斷的依據，只要解釋到位，分數不會太低。
group project可以選自己喜歡的題目，除了其他組別做得很認真仔細，沒什麼壓力的，老師也很樂意給意見。
reviews.comment_workload:
-小組口頭報告，題目自定
-書面報告，基本上就是將講稿打出來標好references
-final老師給範圍，open book
-上課發言有bonus，在canvas discussion留言也有

reviews.author: vivianwyn
reviews.comment_content:
-This course is about the development of techniques n style of different art forms in China.
-Topics include pottery, jade, architecture, Buddhist art, etc
reviews.comment_teaching:
-Sweet n patient professor :)
-Extremely helpful TA > u can get loads of suggestions from him on the group project, including topic setting :)
reviews.comment_grading:
-Well, just do ur individual paper nicely, A range, haha
-Prof. do give high marks to most of the students, so, ya, the deviation bit narrow
reviews.comment_workload:
-individual paper:
discuss an art work selected by urself (~1000 words)

-group presentation (3 ppl/ team):
20 minutes + 5 minutes Q&A session
real simple

-final: 20 mc > recognize the artworks shown in lecture ppt

reviews.author: maksyu
reviews.title: Must-take Course!
reviews.comment_content:
This course will cover Buddhist art, ceramics, pottery, and calligraphy etc., which provides sufficient knowledge as   a introductory level art course.

Apart from taking regular classes, students would also need to attend collector talks and visit some off-campus Chinese art exhibitions
reviews.comment_teaching: Professor Fu is an extremely nice teacher (e.g. distributed snacks to students as she worried that some of them did not have breakfast ). She is definitely passionate in teaching as well as sharing the beautifulness of our world. She offers students the utmost freedom to explore and pursue their interest. For students who finish her course, she would continue sending the information of the latest Chinese art exhibitions.
reviews.comment_grading:
1. Individual Project: Written Essay (Catalogue Entry in 2015/16 Spring): 30%

2. Group Presentation: Oral presentation (Hand in PPT File) : 30%

3. Examination (MC): 25%
- very easy. would be given a very specific scope of the exam (some slides of art pieces in lecture ppts).  all you need to do is jot notes during lessons and recite all the information(not much) of the art pieces.
- extremely sufficient time to finish the exam.

4. Participation: 15%
- X roll calls in every lesson
- only participation of gallery tour, collector's talk, museum visit and project presentation are counted.
- 2 points deduction for each unexcused absence from the activities listed above.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is quite light unless there are many free riders in your group.

1. Catalogue Entry
- writing catalogue entry for your favourite miniature.

2. Group presentation
- present whatever you like. All you need to do is to relate the concept you learned and applied that in your analysis. very simple. You are given lots of freedom to decide what to present.

3. Examination

reviews.author: 2000li
reviews.title: 超好grade的中國藝術課
reviews.comment_content:
中國藝術
1. 陶器
2. 玉器
3. 青銅器
4. 雕塑
5. 佛教藝術
6. 瓷器
7. 書法
8. 繪畫
reviews.comment_teaching: 教授的講解非常清晰，指出不同藝術品的特色，很容易理解，課堂上的ppt非常簡潔，上課時可以參考同學的發言去作答考試。教授人很好，有問必答。
reviews.comment_grading:
Quiz 40%
Project 40% (oral present 35% + written report 5%)
Field Trip Report 5%
Attendance 10%
Participation 5%

因為疫情的關係，Filed Trip Report 取消，該 5% 加進去project written report。

Attendance是扣分制，缺席一堂扣 1 分；缺席 project present、guest talk 扣 2 分。有特殊原因缺席可以電郵教授請假，獲准的請假不扣分。

Participation每次上課發言有 1 分；每次在Canvas Discussion留言也有 1 分。

Quiz有複習、Project根據指引去做就有mean。

成績分佈：
總分平均分是87.8，中位數是89.2，標準差是6.2

[95.00, 100.00] A+

[93.00, 95.00) A

[91.60, 93.00) A-

[89.00, 91.60) B+

[85.00, 89.00) B

[82.00, 85.00) B-
*低mean 0.93 sd也能有B-，其他課已經C/ C+了

[80.00, 82.00) C+

[70.00,80.00) C

[0, 70.00) C-
reviews.comment_workload:
教授在quiz前會提供範圍，加上open book (online exam)，所以不用花太多時間去複習。

主要的workload就是project，只要沒有free-rider就能輕鬆做完，written report就把oral present的講稿整理一下，所以整體來說這個course是十分輕鬆。

reviews.author: Hester
reviews.comment_content: The content is very rich, with different areas of arts being taught. The details of statues, architectures were taught that has really widen my horizons.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof. Fu has got great understanding and knowledge in arts. She is a nice person who is very helpful and patience to students. Her teaching is pretty good, yet you would have to pay great attention as she is quite soft-speaking.
reviews.comment_grading: Absolutely great. Got a B+ with a slightly above mean assignment and group presentation. Not sure about the marks of my final exam, but I guess it should be slightly  below mean.
reviews.comment_workload: Light workload, with 1 catalogue entry, 1 group presentation, 1 final exam and few fieldtrips. Overall, very worthwhile to take the course!

reviews.author: kevin67713
reviews.title: Recent Activity in HUMA1660
reviews.comment_content: included fantastic and interesting content, I am pretty sure you will learn something from it.
reviews.comment_grading:
essay and group project were super easy to do. but you have to pay attention to the final exam (no midterm).
          individual essay (30%),                I got 29/30
          group project (30%) ,                   I got 29.5/30
          final exam (25%),                         I got 22.5/25
         field trip and attendance(15%)       15/15
in total was 96% but final grade was A only, i think I would have had A+ if I could get 2 more questions right in the final exam, thats why I suggest you guys pay more attention to final exam.
